q: Nations Security Council to authorise force in C?te d'Ivoire as West African nations seek to further pressure strongman Laurent Gbagbo to quit power. Odein Ajumogobia, in an editorial published in Nigerian newspapers, said the crisis single handedly precipitated by Mr Laurent Gbagbo... will inevitably lead to anarchy and chaos, or worse, a full-blown civil war if not resolved. Nigerian President Goodluck Jonathan is the current chairperson of West African bloc Ecowas, which has threatened to use force if Gbagbo does not step down in favour of his internationally recognised rival Alassane Ouattara .
